snippet: Germany’s economic decline late last year and a flurry of disappointing results recently in other major economies raised questions about Europe’s ability to escape recession.
abstract: Germany’s economic decline late in 2012 and flurry of disappointing results in other major economies raises questions about Europe’s ability to escape recession.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS KULISH and JACK EWING
byline.contributor: Nicholas Kulish reported from Berlin, and Jack Ewing from Frankfurt.

lead_paragraph: Germany’s economic decline late last year and a flurry of disappointing results recently in other major economies raised questions about Europe’s ability to escape recession.

headline.seo: Slowdown in Germany Worries Euro Zone
headline.main: Slowdown in Germany Worries Euro Zone
headline.print_headline: Slowdown In Germany Worries Euro Zone
